translated: The Paṭṭhāna Treatise🔽(The Paṭṭhāna Treatise, in the order of the ideas, and in the reverse order, with the triplets and the dyads)

original: Dhammānulomapaccanīya (3), Tikadukapaṭṭhānapāḷi (4)🔽16.4. Kusalattika, Hetusahetukaduka🔽Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca
analyzed: dhamma anuloma paccanīya tika duka paṭṭhāna pāḷi  kusala ttika hetu sa hetuka duka  kusalam hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetuko ca
translated: The Triad of the Wholesome, the Dyad of Root and Root-Possessor

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naabyākato🔽nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na abyākataḥ  na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam hetuñca iva sa hetukañca
translated: With root-cause and root-possessor as condition, there is an unwholesome idea that is root-possessor only. With root-cause and root-possessor as condition, there is an indeterminate idea that is root-possessor only.🔽With root-cause and root-possessor as condition, there is an unwholesome idea that is root-possessor only, and an indeterminate idea that is root-possessor only.

original: dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naabyākato nahetu ceva naahetuko🔽ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Akusalaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … tīṇi.
analyzed: dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetuko ca na abyākataḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetuko  ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  akusalam hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā tīṇi
translated: With root-cause and root-possessor as condition, there is an unwholesome idea that is root-possessor only, and a wholesome idea that is root-possessor only.🔽With root-cause and root-possessor as condition, there is an unwholesome idea that is root-possessor only, and a wholesome idea that is root-possessor only, and an indeterminate idea that is root-possessor only.

original: Abyākataṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca
analyzed: abyākatam hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetuko ca
translated: With root-possessor only as condition, there is an unwholesome idea that is root-possessor only. With root-possessor only as condition, there is an indeterminate idea that is root-possessor only.🔽With root-possessor only as condition, there is an unwholesome idea that is root-possessor only, and an indeterminate idea that is root-possessor only.

original: dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo
analyzed: dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam hetum ca iva sa hetukañca dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ
translated: A neutral, causally induced state arises with a neutral cause as condition.

original: nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Abyākataṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko ca naakusalo nahetu ceva naahetuko
analyzed: na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā abyākatam hetuñca iva sa hetukañca  dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ ca na akusalaḥ na hetu ca iva na ahetukaḥ
translated: A neutral, causally un-induced state arises with a neutral cause as condition.
A neutral, causally un-induced state arises with a neutral cause as condition.🔽(In brief.)

original: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke tīṇi …pe… avigate nava.🔽Kusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu
analyzed: hetuyāḥ nava pe vipāke tīṇi pe avigate nava  kusalam sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu
translated: With a cause, nine. … With an action, three. … With an obstruction, nine.

original: ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: A wholesome, causally induced state arises with a wholesome, causally un-induced state as condition.🔽A unwholesome, causally un-induced state arises with a wholesome, causally un-induced state as condition.

original: naabyākato naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Kusalaṁ sahetukañceva🔽na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca naabyākato naahetuko
analyzed: na abyākataḥ na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā kusalam sa hetukam ca iva 🔽na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na akusalaḥ na ahetuko ca iva na na hetu ca na abyākataḥ na ahetuko
translated: A neutral, causally un-induced state arises with a wholesome, causally un-induced state as condition.

original: ceva nanahetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā … tīṇi.🔽Akusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nakusalo naahetuko ceva nanahetu🔽ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Akusalaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca
analyzed: ca iva na na hetu ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā tīṇi  akusalam sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca na kusalaḥ na ahetukaḥ ca iva na na hetu  ca dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā akusalam sa hetukam ca iva na ca hetum dhammam paṭicca
translated: … with root-cause and without root-cause … three.
